                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: বলের মাত্রা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-62" style="width: 5.084em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-63"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-64" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-65" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">[</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-66" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-67" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-68"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-69" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-70"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-71"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-72" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-73" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-74" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-5">\rm → [MLT^{-2}]</script></span><br>
ক্ষমতার মাত্রা <sub><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-75" style="width: 5.535em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-76"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-77" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-78" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৯]</p>

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 3</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>বায়ু চাপ মাপার যন্ত্র নিচের কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ব্যারোমিটার</p>
</label>

                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>থার্মোমিটার</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: হাইড্রোমিটার → তরল পদার্থের আপেক্ষিক ঘনত্ব পরিমাপের যন্ত্র; থার্মোমিটার → তাপমাত্রা পরিমাপের যন্ত্র।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-০৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-90" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-91"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-92" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-7">\therefore </script></span> শতকরা ত্রুটি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>0.4</mn><mn>10.4</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.84</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-93" style="width: 16.273em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.322em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1013.28em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-94"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-95" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-96" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-97"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-98" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">Δ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-99" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-100"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-101" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.207em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-102" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.9em, 1.191em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-108" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-109" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10.4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-110" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3.84</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>∆</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>0.4</mn><mn>10.4</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.84</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\rm = \frac {∆l}{l_1}×100\%=\frac{0.4}{10.4}×100\%=3.84\%</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 11</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.166em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-217" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; clip: rect(2.748em, 1001.03em, 4.797em, -999.998em); top: -4.137em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-244" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-245" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-246"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-247" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 5.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -3.397em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 5.053em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mrow><mo>|</mo><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-19">\rm \overrightarrow {P}=\hat{i}-\hat{j}-\hat{k} \\
\left|\overrightarrow {P}\right|=\sqrt{1^2+\left(-1\right)^2+\left(-1\right)^2}=\sqrt3 </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2207;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>.</mo><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-259" style="width: 5.239em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.283em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.776em, 1004.24em, 2.416em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-260"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-261"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.004em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; </label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2207;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-292" style="width: 5.002em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.1em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.535em, 1004.06em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-293"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-294"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.084em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-295" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">∇</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.95em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.793em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-296" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-297" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-298" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.125em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-299" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.95em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.793em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-300" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-301" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-302" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">∇</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>×</mo><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-24">\rm \overrightarrow \nabla \times \overrightarrow V =0</script></span> হলে অঘূর্ণনশীল, সংরক্ষণশীল<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2207;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>&amp;#x2260;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-303" style="width: 5.002em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.1em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.535em, 1004.06em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-304"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-305"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.084em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-306" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">∇</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.95em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.793em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-307" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-308" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-309" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.125em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-310" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.95em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.793em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-311" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-312" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≠</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-313" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">∇</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>×</mo><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-25">\rm \overrightarrow \nabla \times \overrightarrow V \neq0</script></span> হলে ঘূর্ণনশীল, অসংরক্ষণশীল<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2207;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>.</mo><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-314" style="width: 4.264em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.486em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.535em, 1003.45em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-315"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-316"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.084em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-317" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">∇</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.95em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.793em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-318" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-320" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.125em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-321" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.95em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.793em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-322" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-323" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-324" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">∇</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>.</mo><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-26">\rm \overrightarrow \nabla .\overrightarrow  V=0</script></span> হলে সলিনয়ডাল<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১১১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 15</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>যে ভেক্টরের মান শূন্য নয় তাকে কী বলে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সঠিক ভেক্টর</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>নাল ভেক্টর</p>
</label>

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>একক ভেক্টর</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অবস্থান ভেক্টর</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: যে ভেক্টরের মান শূন্য এবং নির্দিষ্ট দিক নেই তাকে নাল ভেক্টর বলে।&nbsp;<br>
[বি.দ্র: ইসহাক স্যারের বইয়ের তথ্যটি সঠিক নয়]<br>
[তপন স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-38-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-445" style="width: 3.855em; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.125em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-448" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.95em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.834em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-449" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-450" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-451" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-452"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.166em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-453" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.95em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.793em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-454" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-38">\rm \overrightarrow {A}=2 \overrightarrow {B}</script></span> হলে, ভেক্টরদ্বয়:&nbsp;সদৃশ ভেক্টর, একই দিকে ক্রিয়া করে, সমজাতীয় ভেক্টর।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১২৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটি হিসাবের জন্য ইন্টিগ্রাল ক্যালকুলাস ব্যবহার করা হয়?</p>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ক্ষেত্রফল, আয়তন, ভরকেন্দ্র, কাজ, চাপ ইত্যাদি হিসাব করতে ইন্টিগ্রাল ক্যালকুলাস ব্যবহার করা হয়।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১০২]</p>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৯৮]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 21</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সর্বোচ্চ বিন্দুতে প্রাসের কোন ঘটনাটি সঠিক?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সর্বোচ্চ বিন্দুতে গতিশক্তি সর্বোচ্চ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সর্বোচ্চ বিন্দুতে স্থিতিশক্তি সর্বনিম্ন</p>
</label>

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                        </div>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৯০]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 23</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একব্যক্তি সূর্যোদয়ের দিকে 12 m যাবার পর ঠিক উত্তর দিক ঘুরল এবং 5m গেল, তার সরণ কত মিটার?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>

</label>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>16.67 m</p>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-497" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-498"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-499" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-47">\therefore </script></span>&nbsp;সরণ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>12</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>13</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-500" style="width: 9.797em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.035em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1008.03em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-501"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-502" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-503" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-504" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.592em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1003.57em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-505"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-506"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-507"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-508"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-509" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-510" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-511" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-512" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-513" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-514" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1003.57em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.752em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.568em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 2.871em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.371em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.904em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 1.395em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 1.887em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 2.379em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1001.03em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.178em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-515" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-516" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">13</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-517" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-518" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>12</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>13</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-48">\rm s=\sqrt{{12}^2+5^2}=13\ m</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৬৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 24</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>অভিকর্ষের টানে মুক্তভাবে পড়ন্ত বস্তুর ত্বরণ নিচের কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সমত্বরণ</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 28</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিউক্লিয়াস গঠনে ভূমিকা রাখে কোন বল?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সবল নিউক্লীয় বল</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>দুর্বল নিউক্লীয় বল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>তড়িৎ চৌম্বক বল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>মহাকর্ষ বল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: সবল নিউক্লীয় বল মৌলিক বল সমূহের মধ্যে সর্বাধিক শক্তিশালী।<br>
[তপন স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৩৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 29</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>দ্বিমাত্রিক বস্তু নিচের কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>পাতলা কাগজ</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>দীর্ঘ সরু দণ্ড</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ঝুলন্ত সুতা</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>চেয়ার</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: দ্বিমাত্রিক বস্তু - ফুটবল খেলার মাঠ, পাতলা কাগজ, পাতলা ধাতব পাত।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৫৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 32</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>2 kg ভরের একটি বস্তুকে 3m দীর্ঘ একটি সুতার এক প্রান্ত বেঁধে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-579" style="width: 4.361em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.579em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1003.58em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-580"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-581" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-582" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-583" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-584" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-585" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-586"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.37em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-587" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-588"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-589"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-590" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-58">\rm 4 \ rads^{-1} </script></span> কৌণিক বেগে ঘুরানো হচ্ছে। সুতার ওপর টান হবে নিচের কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-59-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>96</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-592" style="width: 14.1em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-599" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-600" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-601" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-602" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-603" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; clip: rect(3.158em, 1001.19em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-605"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-606" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-607" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-608" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 1.273em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-609" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-610" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-611" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৯১, ২৯২]</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[তপন স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৯৭]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 34</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কৌণিক ভরবেগের সঠিক সমীকরণ কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ঘর্ষণ ৪ প্রকার। যথা: ১. স্থিতি ঘর্ষণ ২. গতীয় বা বিসর্গ ঘর্ষণ ৩. আবর্ত ঘর্ষণ ৪. প্রবাহী ঘর্ষণ।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩০২]</p>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-71-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-713" style="width: 3.782em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.099em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.642em, 1003.05em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-714"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-715" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-716" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-717" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.276em;">α</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-718" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-719" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.669em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>α</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-71">\rm a=\alpha\ r </script></span></p>

                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

                                        <br>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 40</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ফটোগ্রাফিক ফিল্মে শক্তির রূপান্তরের ক্ষেত্রে কোনটি সঠিক?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>রাসায়নিক শক্তি → আলোক শক্তি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আলোক শক্তি → রাসায়নিক শক্তি</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>যান্ত্রিক শক্তি → আলোক শক্তি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আলোক শক্তি → যান্ত্রিক শক্তি</p>
</label>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৫০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>কৃতকাজ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>.</mo><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-839" style="width: 13.199em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.822em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1010.74em, 3.568em, -999.998em);                                         <div class="serial"><span>Question 42</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>প্রতি সেকেন্ডে 980 W ক্ষমতার একটি পাম্প 10 m উচ্চতায় কত Kg তুলতে পারবে?</p>
