                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ক্ষমতা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-80-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>980</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>9.8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-911" style="width: 18.895em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.494em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1015.49em, 2.625em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-912"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-913" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-914" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-918" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-919" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-935" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-936" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.93em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.982em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-937"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-938" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">980</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-939" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-940" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.13em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-941"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-942" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9.8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-943" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-944" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.3em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.297em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-945" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-946" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-947" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-948" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-949" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>980</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>9.8</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-80">\rm P=\frac{W}{t}=\frac{mgh}{t}\Rightarrow m=\frac{pt}{gh}=\frac{980\times1}{9.8\times10}=10\ Kg</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৭৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-83-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-962" style="width: 3.827em;                                             <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-84-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-969" style="width: 4.192em; top: -3.55em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.316em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-975"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.685em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.554em, 1000.37em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-976" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.187em; left: 0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-977" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.78em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.776em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.608em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.725em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>∝</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-84">\rm W\propto\frac{1}{x^2} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৪৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 46</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-85-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-978" style="width: 3.392em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.759em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.68em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-979"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-980" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-981" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-982" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-983" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-984" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">S</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-85">\rm F.P.S </script></span>&nbsp;পদ্ধতিতে কাজের অভিকর্ষীয় একক কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>FPS পদ্ধতিতে কাজের পরম একক Foot-Poundal<br>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 47</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>অভিকর্ষজ বলের বিপরীতে সরণ তিনগুণ হলে কাজ কতগুণ হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>2 গুণ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>3 গুণ</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>4 গুণ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>6 গুণ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: অভিকর্ষজ বলের বিপরীতে কাজ সরণের সমানুপাতিক <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-86-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-985" style="width: 2.912em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.379em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.38em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-986"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-987" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-988" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∝</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-989" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>∝</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-86">\rm W\propto x</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৪৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 49</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>মেরুবিন্দুতে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-87-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-990" style="width: 0.747em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.598em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1000.56em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-991"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-992" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">λ</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>λ</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-87">\rm \lambda</script></span> এর মান কত?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>90°</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>180°</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: বিষুব রেখা বরাবর <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-88-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-993" style="width: 2.953em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.26em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-994"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-995" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">λ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-996" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-997" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-998"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-999"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1000" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>λ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-88">\rm \lambda=0°</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 51</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>জ্যামিতিক কেন্দ্র্রে কোন বস্তুর অভিকর্ষ কেন্দ্র অবস্থিত?&nbsp;</p>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সুষমদণ্ড&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সামান্তরিক&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আংটি&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বেলনাকৃতি বস্তু&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: সুষম দণ্ড&nbsp;→ মধ্যবিন্দুতে; বৃত্ত ও আংটি → জ্যামিতিক কেন্দ্রে; সামান্তরিক → কর্ণদ্বয়ের ছেদবিন্দুতে; বেলনাকৃতির বস্তু → অক্ষের মধ্য বিন্দুতে।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৩৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: মুক্তি বেগ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-89-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1001" style="width: 9.551em; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1016" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.748em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1001.72em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1017"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1018" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1019" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1020" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; [কোনো বস্তুর মুক্তিবেগ গ্রহের ভর ও ব্যাসার্ধের উপর নির্ভর করে। বস্তুর ভর বা বেগের উপর নয়।]<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৬১]</p>
</span>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 55</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পৃথিবীর ভর কত?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>

                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-90-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>24</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1021" style="width: 5.831em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[তপন স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৫]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 56</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>উৎক্ষেপণ বেগ কত হলে বস্তুটি পৃথিবীকে বৃত্তাকার পথে প্রদক্ষিণ করবে?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 57</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো বস্তুকে বিষুবীয় অঞ্চল থেকে মেরু অঞ্চলের দিকে নিয়ে গেলে এর ওজন কী হয়?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বাড়তে থাকে&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>একই থাকে&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>প্রথমে বাড়ে পরে কমে&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: মেরু অঞ্চলে g&nbsp;এর মান বিষুবীয় অঞ্চল থেকে বেশি।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 58</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পৃথিবীতে কোনো বস্তুর ভর 50 kg হলে চাঁদে এর ভর কত?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>50 kg</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: পৃথিবীতে ও চাঁদে বস্তুর ভর একই থাকবে কিন্তু ওজন পরিবর্তন হবে।<br>

clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.1em, 4.283em, -999.998em); top: -3.504em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.544em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1212"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.959em, 1000.5em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.683em; left: 0.594em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-top: 1.2px solid; width: 0.503em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.327em, 1000.59em, 4.283em, -999.998em); top: -4.051em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1001.23em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.775em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.892em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>η</mi><mo>∝</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></msqrt></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-105">\rm \eta\propto\frac{1}{\sqrt T} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-106-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B7;</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1215" style="width: 3.645em; top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1216"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1217" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">η<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.731em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1221" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫১৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

                                        <br>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1275" style="width: 1.004em; top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1276"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1277"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.549em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.139em; margin-left: 0.139em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.554em, 1000.41em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.415em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.18em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1278" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -3.641em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.18em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1279" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.55em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.549em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.447em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-114">\frac{\pi}{3} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: সরণ =&nbsp;sin wave<br>
বেগ = cos wave<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫৬৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 75</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সরল ছন্দিত গতিসম্পন্ন একটি কণার গতির সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-116-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B4;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1285" style="width: 9.391em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.677em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1007.57em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1286"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1287" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1288" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1289" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">10</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1290" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1291"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1292" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1293" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1294" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1295" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1296" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">δ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1297" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>ω</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>δ</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-116">\rm y=10\sin(\omega t+\delta)</script></span> এবং পর্যায়কাল 6.28 s হলে কৌণিক কম্পাঙ্ক কত?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-117-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1298" style="width: 4.055em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.327em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.277em, 1003.33em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1299"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1300" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1301" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1302" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1303" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1304"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.368em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.37em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1305" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1306"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1307"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1308" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1309" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-117">\rm 1rads^{-1} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-121-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3.14</mn></mrow><mn>6.28</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1347" style="width: 11.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.551em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1009.55em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1348"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1349" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1351" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1352"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1353" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1354" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1355" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1356" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1357" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.13em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1358"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1359" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1360" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1361" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3.14</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1362" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6.28</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.3em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.297em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1363" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1364" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1365" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1366" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1367" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1368"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1369" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1370"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1371"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1372" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1373" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>ω</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3.14</mn></mrow><mn>6.28</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-121">\rm \omega=\frac{2\pi}{T}=\frac{2\times3.14}{6.28}=1rads^{-1} </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫৭৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 76</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটি স্থানিক পর্যাবৃত্তির উদাহরণ নয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সরল দোলকের গতি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ইলেকট্রিক পোল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>চাঁদের প্রদক্ষিণ</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: চাঁদের প্রদক্ষিণ কালিক পর্যাবৃত্তির উদাহরণ।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫৬৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 77</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সুরযুক্ত শব্দের যে বৈশিষ্ট্য দ্বারা চড়া ও মোটা সুরের মধ্যে পার্থক্য করা যায়, তাকে কী বলে?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-122-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1374" style="width: 8.855em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.256em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1007.26em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1375"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1376"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1377" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">λ</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1378" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1382" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1383" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1384" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">λ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1386" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1387" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1388" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi>λ</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>λ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-122">\rm \frac{\lambda}{2}=1\ m\Rightarrow\lambda=2\ m</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৬১]</p>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>200 dB</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৭৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 85</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>গুরু ষষ্ঠক এর সুরবিরাম এর অনুপাত কোনটি?&nbsp;</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[তপন স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৩]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 87</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: গড়শক্তি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-148-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>12</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1613" style="width: 6.764em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1005.49em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1614"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1615" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1616" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1617" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1618" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1619" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1620" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1621" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1622" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1623" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1624" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1625" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>12</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-148">\rm = \frac{12}{2}kT=6\ kT</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৯৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 93</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>বাস্তব গ্যাস বয়েলের সূত্র মেনে চলে-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>নিম্ন তাপমাত্রায়&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
