height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2.24</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-153">\rm 2.24\times{10}^{-20}J </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-154-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1.38</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>23</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>300</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo>=</mo><mn>1.24</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1684" style="width: 13.117em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.74em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.895em, 1010.7em, 7.994em, -999.998em); top: -4.875em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1685"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1005.66em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1686" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1687" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1688" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1689" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1690" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1691" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1692" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1693" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1694" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1010.7em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -2.375em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-1695" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1696" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1697" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1698" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1699" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1.38</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1700" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1701" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1702"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1703"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1704" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1705"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1706"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1707" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1708" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">23</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1709" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1710" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">300</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1006.85em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -1.064em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-1711" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1712" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1713" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.24</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1714" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1715" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1716"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1717"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1718" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1719"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1720"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1721" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1722" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">20</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1723" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.879em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -3.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.803em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1.38</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>23</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>300</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mn>1.24</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-154">\rm E=2\times\frac{3}{2}kT&nbsp; \\ =3\times1.38\times{10}^{-23}\times300&nbsp;\\ =1.24\times{10}^{-20}J&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৫৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 97</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>তিনটি গ্যাস অণুর বেগ 10, 15&nbsp;এবং <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-155-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>20</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1724" style="width: 3.914em; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1759"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1760"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1761" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>15</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-158">\rm 15ms^{-1} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-159-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>10.5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1763" style="width: 4.829em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-160-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>15</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>20</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>15.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1773" style="width: 13.199em;                                         <div class="serial"><span>Question 98</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নির্দিষ্ট তাপমাত্রায় সকল গ্যাস অণুর জন্য কোন রাশিটি ধ্রুবক?&nbsp;</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-161-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1809" style="width: 9.797em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.035em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1007.99em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1810"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1811" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1812" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1813" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1814" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1815" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1816" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1817" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1818" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1819" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1820" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1821" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1822" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1823" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1824" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1825" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1826" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∝</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1827" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">T</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>∝</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-161">\rm E=\frac{3}{2}nkT,\ So,\ E\propto T&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৫৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 99</span></div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 100</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>27℃ তাপমাত্রা 300 ml পরিমাপ একটি গ্যাসকে একই চাপে রেখে 7℃ তাপমাত্রায় নিয়ে আসা হলো, এর আয়তন কত হবে?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

</label>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.34em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1862" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1863" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -1.35em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1864"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1865" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">300</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1866" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1867" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">280</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1868" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">300</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.79em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.789em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1869" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1870" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">280</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1871" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1872" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1873" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>×</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>300</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>280</mn></mrow><mn>300</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>280</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-162">\rm  \frac{V_1}{T_1}=\frac{V_2}{T_2} \Rightarrow V_2=\frac{V_1\times T_2}{T_1}=\frac{300\times280}{300}=280\ mL </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৩৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

    <div class="TakeExamHeader">
        
        
        
        <h2 style="font-size: 25px;">MCQ Master Set: 2 (Question &amp; Solution)</h2>

            <div class="TakeExamBody">
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 101</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পাখির উড়া পর্যবেক্ষণ করে উড়োজাহাজের মডেল তৈরি করেন কে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>রবার্ট&nbsp;হুক</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>রজার বেকন</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>লিওনার্দো দ্য ভিঞ্চি</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>নিউটন</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[তপন স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 102</span></div>

                                    </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: বলের মাত্রা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-53" style="width: 5.084em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.141em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.02em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-54"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-55" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-56" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">[</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-57" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-58" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-59"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-61"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-62"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-63" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-5">\rm → [MLT^{-2}]</script></span><br>
ক্ষমতার মাত্রা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-66" style="width: 5.535em; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-76"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-77"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-78" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-6">\rm → [ML^2T^{-3}]</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 103</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পরমাণুর নিউক্লিয়াসকে ভেঙ্গে প্রচুর শক্তি তৈরি করতে কোন যন্ত্র ব্যবহার করা হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>রিয়্যাক্টর</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ব্যারোমিটার</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                            </div>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>থার্মোমিটার</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: হাইড্রোমিটার → তরল পদার্থের আপেক্ষিক ঘনত্ব পরিমাপের যন্ত্র;&nbsp;<br>
থার্মোমিটার → তাপমাত্রা পরিমাপের যন্ত্র।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-০৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 108</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি গোলকের পরিমাপকৃত ব্যাসার্ধ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>2.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-81" style="width: 7.155em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.851em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1005.85em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-82"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-83" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-84" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-85" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-86" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">0.2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-87" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-88" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-89" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>2.5</mn><mo>±</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-7">\rm (2.5\pm0.2)cm </script></span> হলে এর আয়তন পরিমাপের শতকরা ত্রুটি কত?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো:<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-90" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-91"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-92" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\therefore</script></span> আয়তন পরিমাপের শতকরা ত্রুটি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mfrac><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mfrac><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mfrac><mn>0.2</mn><mn>2.5</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>24</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-93" style="width: 24.018em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.674em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1019.63em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-94"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-95" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-96" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.11em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.572em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-97"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-98" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">Δ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-99" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-100" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.23em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-101" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">100</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-105" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-106"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.23em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-111" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-112" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">100</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-113" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-117" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-118" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-119" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2.5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-120" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-121" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">100</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-124" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">24</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-125" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>∆</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mfrac><mrow><mo>∆</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>0.2</mn><mn>2.5</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>24</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-9">\rm = \frac{∆V}{V}×100\%=3\frac{∆R}{R}×100\%=3×\frac{0.2}{2.5}×100\%=24\% </script></span>&nbsp;<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 109</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>1 গ্যালন কত ঘনমিটার এর সমান?</p>

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.415em; left: 1.004em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-173"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-174"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-175" style="font-size: 70.7%; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msqrt><mn>12</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-228" style="width: 2.416em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.428em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.998em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>62</mn></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">\rm \vec{P}=2\hat{i}-3\hat{j}-7\hat{k} \\\left|\vec{P}\right|=\sqrt{2^2+\left(-3\right)^2+\left(-7\right)^2}=\sqrt{62} </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 112</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটির মাধ্যমে একটি ভেক্টর ক্ষেত্রকে স্কেলার ক্ষেত্রে রূপান্তর করা যায়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-১০৮]</p>

                            <div class="row question">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 113</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ক্যালকুলাসের প্রধান শাখা ২ টি। যথা: ১. ডিফারেনসিয়াল ক্যালকুলাস, ২. ইন্টিগ্রাল ক্যালকুলাস।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১০২]</p>
</span>

overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.614em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">∇</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-24">\rm \vec{\nabla}\times\vec{V}\ \neq0 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 115</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>বস্তুর ঘূর্ণনের সঙ্গে যুক্ত ভেক্টরকে কী বলে?</p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: বস্তুর ঘূর্ণনের সাথে যুক্ত নয় এমন ভেক্টরকে পোলার ভেক্টর বলে।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 117</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-38-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-557" style="width: 4.026em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.281em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.12em, 1003.24em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-558"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-559"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-560"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-561"><span style="display: inline-block;                                 <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 119</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটি হিসাবের জন্য ডিফারেনসিয়াল ক্যালকুলাস ব্যবহার করা হয়?</p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বেগ</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কাজ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ভরকেন্দ্র</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>চাপ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: বেগ, ত্বরণ, বক্ররেখার ঢাল ইত্যাদি হিসাব করতে ডিফারেনসিয়াল ক্যালকুলাস ব্যবহার করা হয়।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১০২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 123</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি বল <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>19.6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-639" style="width: 4.883em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.988em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1003.99em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-640"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-641" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">19.6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-642" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-643"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.37em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-644" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-645"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-646"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-647" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-648" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>19.6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-48">\rm 19.6ms^{-1}</script></span> গতিতে সোজা ওপরে ছোড়া হলো। বলটি সর্বোচ্চ কত উচ্চতায় পৌঁছাতে পারবে?</p>

                                        </div>

[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৮৯]</p>

                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>তরল <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-51-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-688" style="width: 1.459em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.186em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.19em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-689"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-690"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.186em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.73em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-691" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.731em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-692" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.219em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.114em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-51">\rm N_2&nbsp;</script></span></p>

                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>তরল <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-693" style="width: 1.459em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.186em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.19em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-694"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-695"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.186em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.73em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-696" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.731em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-697" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.219em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.114em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-52">\rm H_2&nbsp;</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: জ্বালানি হিসেবে রকেটে তরল <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-698" style="width: 1.232em; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৫৬]</p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: অসংরক্ষণশীল বলের ক্রিয়ায় পূর্ণচক্রে মোট কাজ শূন্য হয় না।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৭৫]</p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-745" style="width: 4.182em;                                     <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 131</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একক কৌণিক বেগের ঘূর্ণনরত বস্তুর গতি জড়তার ভ্রামক সংখ্যাগত ভাবে গতিশক্তির কতগুণ?</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩১৪]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 132</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-61-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-779" style="width: 3.132em; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0.2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-61">\rm 0.2\ kg </script></span> ভরের একটি বস্তুকে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-62-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-785" style="width: 2.871em;
