width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.911em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0.5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-62">\rm 0.5\ m </script></span> লম্বা রশিতে বেঁধে সমান্তরালে বৃত্তাকার <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-63-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-790" style="width: 4.063em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.318em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1003.32em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-791"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-792" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-793" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-794" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-795" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-796"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.37em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-797" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-798"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-799"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-800" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-801" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-63">\rm 4rads^{-1}</script></span> বেগে ঘোরালে রশির ঘূর্ণায়মান টান কত N হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-64-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>1.6</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-802" style="width: 15.945em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.076em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1013.03em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-803"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-804" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-805" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-806" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-807"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-808" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-809" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-810" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-811" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-812" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-813" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-814" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1001.19em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-815"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-816" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-817" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-818" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 1.273em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-819" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-820" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-821" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-822" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-823" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.6</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-824" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-825" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>1.6</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-64">\rm F=m\omega^2r=0.2\times\left(4\right)^2\times0.5=1.6\ N </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৯১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 133</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ওয়াট এর সাথে অশ্বক্ষমতার সম্পর্ক নিচের কোনটি?</p>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>w</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1000</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-862" style="width: 8.745em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.152em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1007.15em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-863"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-864" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-865" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-866" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-867" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">w</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-868" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-869" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-870" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">1000</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-871" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-872" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">w</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1000</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-68">\rm 1\ kwh=1000\ W </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৭২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 136</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কৌণিক ভরবেগ ও কৌণিক বেগের মধ্যে সম্পর্ক নিচের কোনটি?</p>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-907" style="width: 3.645em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.962em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1002.96em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-908"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-909" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-910" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-911" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">I</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-912" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi>ω</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-73">\rm L=I\omega </script></span></p>

                                            </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-913" style="width: 3.418em;                                             </div>

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 139</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>বলের বিরুদ্ধে কাজের ক্ষেত্রে-</p>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-77-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>90</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3B8;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2264;</mo><mn>180</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-935" style="width: 8.108em;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>90</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3B8;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mn>180</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-950" style="width: 8.108em;                                             </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-79-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>90</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2264;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3B8;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2264;</mo><mn>180</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-965" style="width: 8.108em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-80-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>90</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2264;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3B8;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mn>180</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-980" style="width: 8.108em;                                             </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৩৭]</p>

                            </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 140</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কয়লা পোড়ালে নিচের কোন শক্তির রূপান্তর ঘটে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.275em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-82">\rm \vec{S}=\left(3\hat{i}-5\hat{j}\right)m</script></span> সরণ হয়, তবে বলের দ্বারা কৃতকাজ কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-83">\rm W=\vec{F}.\vec{S}=\left(5\hat{i}+\hat{j}-\hat{k}\right).\left(3\hat{i}-5\hat{j}\right)=15-5=10\ J </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৪১]</p>
</span>

                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 142</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>100 Kg ভরের একটি পাথরকে ক্রেনের সাহায্যে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-84-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.1</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1114" style="width: 4.287em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.504em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1003.5em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1115"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.1</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1117" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1118"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.37em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1119" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1120"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1121"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1122" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1123" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0.1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-84">\rm 0.1ms^{-1}</script></span> বেগে ছাদের উপর তুললে ক্ষমতা কত?</p>

                                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-85-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>98</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1124" style="width: 18.117em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.838em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1014.84em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1125"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1126" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1127" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">F</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1130" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1131" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1132" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1133" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1134" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1135" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">100</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1136" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1137" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">9.8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1139" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1140" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1141" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">98</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1142" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1143" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>98</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-85">\rm P=FV=mgv=100\times9.8\times0.1=98\ W </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৭৩]<br>
&nbsp;</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 143</span></div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-89-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>9.79</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1177" style="width: 4.829em; position: relative; width: 1.368em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.37em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1182" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: বিষুব অঞ্চলে g এর মান <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-90-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>9.780</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1187" style="width: 4.715em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.855em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1003.86em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1188"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1189" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">9.780</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1190" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1191" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1192"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1193" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1194"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1195"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1196" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1197" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>9.780</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-90">\rm 9.780\ ms^{-2}</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 144</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটি সংরক্ষণশীল বলের বৈশিষ্ট্য নয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বৈদ্যুতিক বল একটি সংরক্ষণশীল বল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>শুধু অবস্থানের উপর নির্ভর করে</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কাজ পথের উপর নির্ভর করে</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সামান্তরিক&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সুষমদণ্ড</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বৃত্ত&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বেলনাকৃতি বস্তু&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: সুষম দণ্ড&nbsp;→ মধ্যবিন্দুতে; বৃত্ত ও আংটি → জ্যামিতিক কেন্দ্রে; বেলনাকৃতির বস্তু→ অক্ষের মধ্য বিন্দুতে।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৩৬]</p>
</span>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: পোলার উপগ্রহের আবর্তনকাল 110 মিনিট।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৪৯]</p>
</span>

                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 153</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পৃথিবীর ভর অপরিবর্তিত রেখে ব্যাসার্ধ 4 গুণ করা হলো। তাহলে পৃথিবীতে অভিকর্ষজ ত্বরণ এর মান কত হবে?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                        <br>

position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1256" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1257" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1258" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1259" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1260" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1261" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1262" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1263" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>16</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-93">\rm g=\frac{GM}{R^2}\Rightarrow g^\prime=\frac{GM}{\left(4R\right)^2}=\frac{GM}{16R^2}=\frac{GM}{R^2}\times\frac{1}{16}=\frac{1}{16}\times g </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪১৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 154</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সবচেয়ে দুর্বল মৌলিক বল কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সবল নিউক্লীয় বল&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>দুর্বল নিউক্লীয় বল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>মহাকর্ষ বল</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>তাড়িতচৌম্বক বল&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: সবল নিউক্লীয় বল &gt; তাড়িতচৌম্বক বল &gt; দুর্বল নিউক্লীয় বল &gt; মহাকর্ষ বল।<br>
[তপন স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৩৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[তপন স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৫]</p>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 156</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>উৎক্ষেপণ বেগ কত হলে কোনো বস্তু পৃথিবীকে উপবৃত্তাকার পথে প্রদক্ষিণ করতে থাকবে?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mn>7.888</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1370" style="width: 7.871em; padding-left: 0.289em;">7.888</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1374" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1375" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1378"><span style="display: inline-block; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-103-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>7.88</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1385" style="width: 6.314em;                             <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 157</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো বস্তুকে মেরু অঞ্চল থেকে বিষুবীয় অঞ্চলের দিকে নিয়ে গেলে এর ওজন কী হয়?&nbsp;</p>

                                    </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: মেরু অঞ্চলে g এর মান বিষুবীয় অঞ্চল থেকে বেশি।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৬]</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-109-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>40</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>392</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1455" style="width: 10.002em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.199em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1008.16em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1456"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1457" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1458" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1459" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1460" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">40</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1461" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1462" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">9.8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1463" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1464" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">392</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1465" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1466" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>40</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>392</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-109">\rm mg=40\times9.8=392\ N </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-117-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B7;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1514" style="width: 4.419em;                                             </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-118-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B7;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1521" style="width: 4.51em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.691em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.69em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1522"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1523" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1524" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1525" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1526" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1527" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">η<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1528" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1529" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>η</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-118">\rm F=6\pi\eta rv</script></span><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-119-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B7;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1530" style="width: 14.059em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.518em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1011.39em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1531"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1532" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1533" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1534" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1535" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1536" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1537" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∝</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1538" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">η<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1539" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1540" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1541" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1542" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1544" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1546" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1547" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1548" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1549" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1550" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1551" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1552" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1553" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1554" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1555" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1556" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>∝</mo><mi>η</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>π</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-119">\rm So,\ F\propto\eta rv\ [6\pi=k=constant]</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫২২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-120-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1557" style="width: 3.645em; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 1.232em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1575"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1576"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1577" style="font-size: 70.7%; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-122-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1579" style="width: 3.19em;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-123-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1588" style="width: 3.964em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: সান্দ্রতা গুণাঙ্কের একক <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-124-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1601" style="width: 8.814em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1007.17em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1602"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1603" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1604" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1605"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1606" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1607"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1608"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1609" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1618"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1619"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1620" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1621" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1622"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1623"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1624" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1625" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1626" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1627" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1628" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1629" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-124">\rm Nsm^{-2}/Pas^{-1}/Poise</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫১৭]</p>
