                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 168</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>যদি স্পর্শ কোণ 90° এর কম হয়, তবে তরলের পৃষ্ঠ হবে-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>উত্তল&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অবতল&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সমতলাবতল&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সমতলোত্তল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: যদি স্পর্শ কোণ 90° এর বেশি হয়, তবে তরলের পৃষ্ঠ উত্তল হবে।<br>
[তপন স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫৪৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 171</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন ধর্মের কারণে&nbsp;পানির ফোঁটা গোলাকৃতি হয়?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>তলটান&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সান্দ্রতা&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কৈশিকতা&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>স্থিতিস্থাপকতা&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 177</span></div>

                                            <p>শব্দের যে বৈশিষ্ট্য দ্বারা বিভিন্ন বাদ্যযন্ত্র থেকে নির্গত একই প্রাবল্য ও তীক্ষ্মতাযুক্ত স্বরগুলির মধ্যে পার্থক্য করা যায় তাকে সুরযুক্ত শব্দের কী বলে?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>স্থির তরঙ্গের পরস্পর দুইটি সুস্পন্দ বিন্দুর দূরত্ব <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-141-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1717" style="width: 2.61em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.126em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1002.13em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1718"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1719" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1720" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.911em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0.5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-141">\rm 0.5m</script></span> ঐ তরঙ্গের তরঙ্গ দৈর্ঘ্য কত?&nbsp;</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-146-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1738" style="width: 8.199em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.723em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1006.72em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1739"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1740"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">λ</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1742" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1743" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1744" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1745" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1746" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1747" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1748" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">λ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1749" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1750" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1751" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi>λ</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>λ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-146">\rm \frac{\lambda}{2}=0.5m,\ \lambda=1m </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৬১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-147-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1752" style="width: 8.017em;                                                 <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-148-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1771" style="width: 8.017em; padding-left: 0.23em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1775" style="padding-left: 0.23em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.96em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[তপন স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৪০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>গড়শক্তি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-167-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>8</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1986" style="width: 6.15em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.043em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1005em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1987"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1988" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1989" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1990" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1991" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1992" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1993" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1994" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1995" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1996" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1997" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>8</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-167">\rm = \frac{8}{2}kT=4kT </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৬২]</p>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>শুষ্ক ও সিক্ত বাল্বের আর্দ্রতা মাপক যন্ত্রে থার্মোমিটার দুটির পার্থক্য হঠাৎ কমে গেলে কোনটি বুঝায়?&nbsp;</p>

                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বাতাস শুষ্ক&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ঝড় হতে পারে&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৭২]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-174-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2065" style="width: 4.059em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.322em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1003.28em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2066"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2067" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2068" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2069" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2070" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2071" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2072" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2073" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-174">\rm E=\frac{3}{2}kT </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-175-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1.38</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>23</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>300</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2074" style="width: 11.764em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.633em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1009.59em, 2.461em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2087"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2088"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2089" style="font-size: 70.7%; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-176-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>6.21</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>21</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2095" style="width: 7.174em; <p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৫৭]&nbsp;</p>

[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৫১]</p>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 199</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>গ্যাসের চাপ একক আয়তনের গতিশক্তির-</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৫২]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 200</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>T তাপমাত্রার এক লিটার বায়ুকে উত্তপ্ত করা হলো যতক্ষণ না বায়ুর চাপ ও আয়তন উভয়ই দ্বিগুণ হয়, চূড়ান্ত তাপমাত্রা কত?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-191-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2258" style="width: 5.33em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-193-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2331" style="width: 5.371em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2336" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2337" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2338" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2339" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2340"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2342" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-193">\rm \therefore T_2=4\ T_1 </script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৪০]</p>
</span>
